description: abstract image; blue ground fading subtly into grey at right edge; triangular forms in LRC in pale green, yellow, orange, red and pale blue--color shading subtly into other hues
marks: Signature, Title and Date LLC, in pencil: [Intrusion]; LRC, in pencil: [S. W
provenance: The artist, San Francisco (1968; sold for '$75, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1968-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Intrusion
